A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars The Last Jedi is a kind of movie i've never seen in years.  It has everything a good film needs to be.  The movie also bring wobderful eye-dazzling special effects. And most of all\,  it brings us deep into the spiritualism and mysticism of The Force\,  which i found lacks in The Force Awakens and the prequels. But i'm a little disappointed of the absence of a great lightsaber battle
